titleStmt.title: Lanthorne and candle-light. Or, The bell-mans second nights-walke In which he brings to light, a brood of more strange villanies than ener [sic] were till this yeare discouered.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde] for Iohn Busby, and are to be solde at his shop in Fleete-streete, in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A continuation of: The belman of London.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop in Fleete-streete, in Saint Dunstanes Church-yard
